name: Doodle God: Genesis Secrets
description: If you loved the award winning Doodle God or any of the games in the Doodle series, you`ll have to try the new Doodle God Genesis Secrets. Players of all ages will enjoy a hidden object game mode with a unique Doodle God twist! Create an entire universe by mixing and matching different combinations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
